column3: UCL Great Ormond Street Institute of Child Health
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis postgraduate programme integrates the advanced clinical, academic and research components of cardiorespiratory physiotherapy practice. The emphasis is on the management of patients with cardiorespiratory disorders. Flexibility in the selection of modules allows for physiotherapists with particular interests to be accommodated.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
